briefTitle: Follow-On Study of Pitavastatin Versus Atorvastatin in Patients With Type II Diabetes Mellitus and Combined Dyslipidemia

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Type II diabetes mellitus
* Combined dyslipidemia
* Completed NK-104-305 (NCT00309751)

Exclusion Criteria:

* Withdrawal from NK-104-305 (NCT00309751)

outcomeMeasures.title: NCEP LDL-C Target Attainment
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of patients attaining National Cholesterol Education Program (NCEP) LDL-C target at 44 weeks. According to NCEP criteria the target LDL-C is 100 mg/dL for all patients in this study.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percent Change From Baseline in LDL-C
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change from baseline in LDL-C at 44 weeks
